column1: prompt
Change the sentence structure to explain the same idea using the active voice. The ball was kicked by me.
Describe what a perfect day looks like for you.
What is the meaning of the phrase 'to be penny wise and pound foolish'?
Give an example of something you often procrastinate on.
Give two reasons why it is important to be active on social media.
Generate a story where the protagonist discovers their superpower.
Find a job for a transportation system engineer that pays at least 65k per year.
Explain the risk involved in using a technology like AI.
Find the common theme between the following three words: train, plane, and ship.
Classify the following data as either qualitative or quantitative. Age
Generate a new way to use leftovers from a party.
What geographical elements could be used to define a region?
Name an animal that has red fur.
Tell me why people might want to visit the Grand Canyon.
Find the second root of 9.
Construct a news headline using the adjectives excited, little, and fabulous.
Describe the cost of living in New York City.
Find all the prime numbers between 20 and 30.
Describe the characteristic taste of black coffee.
Come up with a solution to reduce traffic congestion.
Generate a creative way to be healthy.
Find the 5th power of -2.
Explain what a reciprocal function is.
Write a headline that captures the most important idea from the following article. Article: Technology has changed the way we work and interact.
Construct a query to find the most recent news articles about artificial intelligence

Write an email to a customer thanking them for their purchase Customer Name – John Smith
Product Purchased – Nike Shoes
Delivery Date – 6/20/2021
Create an algorithm to identify duplicates in a dataset
Generate a story in which a character has a difficult decision to make
Calculate the average of these three numbers: 1, 2, and 3
Suggest a headline for a social media post about a new artificial intelligence technology
Design a logo to promote a startup business.
Generate three example questions to ask in a job interview
Construct a query to list the titles of all books written by John Smith

Given two sentences, construct a third sentence combining the ideas expressed in the two sentences. I enjoy playing the guitar.
I also like singing.
Cite evidence from the text to support the following statement. The main character experienced guilt in the story.
Create 3 multiple-choice questions based on the text below. The internet has drastically changed the way we communicate and interact with each other.
In what circumstances would an entity choose to register as a C Corporation?
What features should a refrigerator have?
Describe the end of the 19th century industrialization movement in the United States.
Evaluate the effectiveness of the current voting methods in the United States.
Determine the current Mood of the US in regards to foreign policy.
Compose a poem of 8 lines that emphasizes the beauty of nature.
Create an algorithm for solving a Tower of Hanoi problem.
Construct a query to search for books about the Roman Empire.
Generate a mission statement for a non-profit organization focused on animal welfare.
Write a paragraph that outlines the differences between playing team sports and individual sports.

Identify the type of poem from the following poem excerpt. In Xanadu did Kubla Khan
A stately pleasure-dome decree;
What is the digital marketing strategy for a new idea? Promoting a subscription-based meal delivery service.
Describe the problem that this algorithm solves. Random Forest
Describe the history and design of the Golden Gate Bridge.
Name 3 principles of the Agile software development methodology.
Analyze the poem's use of figurative language. The night was a blanket of fog that smothered the town
Tell me a story focused on this theme. Friendship

Evaluate this answer to the question. What is the purpose of stock buybacks? 

Answer:
Stock buybacks allow companies to increase their earnings per share.
What are the steps to implement a convolutional neural network?
What is the first letter of the alphabet?
Why is it important to save money?
Think of a funny joke.
Describe the process for making a cup of coffee.
Compare and contrast dogs and cats

Rewrite this sentence to make it more vivid and put it into the past tense:
The cat hopped up onto the table.

Given a recipe, adjust the ingredients for an 8-serving recipe. Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 6 cups onions, thinly sliced
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 3 cups mushrooms, sliced
- 3 cups vegetable broth

Rewrite this sentence to make it more concise and persuasive:
Our company has many great products that all of our customers appreciate.
Brainstorm a list of 5 possible causes of the "Fog of War" phenomenon.

Rewrite this sentence to make it more formal:
This work is really really really great.
Convert the following song lyrics from first-person to second-person point of view. I can't help but laugh when I think about it

Rearrange the following words to make a meaningful sentence:
expensive, most, world's, is, diamond

Rewrite this sentence to make it more formal:
This new policy has met with a lot of approval.

Find three examples of alliteration in the following sentence:
The bubbly baby blindly blundered through the bedroom.

Given a product description, identify the main product feature and describe it in one sentence. The Samsung Galaxy Fold has three AMOLED screens, one on the outside, two on the inside and a powerful battery that can last for more than a day.

Convert the following sentence from active to passive voice.
The police arrested the suspect.
Given a sentence, find its main idea. The company will be launching several new products in the upcoming quarter.

Rewrite the following sentence to make it sound more conversational:
It is imperative that all employees abide by the company's policies.
Name a type of fish that lives in an aquarium.
Write a rap verse about studying.
Identify the syntactic role of the word "cat" in the sentence below. My cat ate the mouse.
How many degrees of arc are in a circle?
Analyze the structural elements of this song. Verse 1: It was late at night, I was thinking of you  / Chorus: In my dreams I see your face / Verse 2: You said the sweetest words that carried me away
What is the current inflation rate in the US?
